sections.heading: school fund; collections on judgments; payable to fund
sections.text: All money arising from collections on judgments in favor of the state, shall be transferred and paid into the permanent school fund and become a part thereof.SourceLaws 1899, c. 69, ยง 36, p. 315;R.S.1913, ยง 5873;C.S.1922, ยง 5208;C.S.1929, ยง 72-2
